identity.mission: Create a Self-Hosted Financial Control App that feels like a 'Command Center'â€”precise, high-contrast, and emotionally grounded in control and clarity.

usage_rules: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings (h1-h3) to give a modern, geometric feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL currency values, dates, and percentage calculations. This aligns with the 'Financial Control' aspect.
Labels and Overlines must be Uppercase, text-xs, and tracking-widest.

rules: CRITICAL: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid deep grays/blacks.
Use 'primary' color SPARINGLY. Only for the main CTA (e.g., 'Add Transaction') or active states.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the defined 'background' hsl(240 10% 3.9%).

bento_rules: Total Balance (Hero): col-span-full md:col-span-8 lg:col-span-6 row-span-2
Recent Transactions (List): col-span-full md:col-span-4 lg:col-span-3 row-span-2
Buckets Summary (Chart): col-span-full md:col-span-4 lg:col-span-3 row-span-2
layout.container_style: max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(37,99,235,0.3)] rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2 transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.style: bg-background border border-input rounded-lg px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines where possible. Use 'Tooltip' with custom dark styling.

navigation.desktop: Sidebar fixed left. w-64 border-r border-border/40 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl
navigation.mobile: Bottom tab bar. Fixed bottom. border-t border-border/40 bg-background/90 backdrop-blur-lg

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay opacity-5 on the main background if possible, but keep it performant.

login_background.desc: Abstract dark curved shapes, perfect for a login side panel.

wishlist_empty.desc: Geometric cubes, use for empty states in Wishlist.

dashboard_header_bg.desc: Dark textured surface, can be used as a subtle banner background.

accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements MUST have a visible ring-2 ring-primary focus state.
accessibility.aria_labels: Buttons without text must have aria-label.

instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Initialize the app in Dark Mode by default. Add a 'theme-toggle' component in the settings, but optimize mostly for Dark.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use 'recharts'. Customize the 'Tooltip' to be dark and minimal. Do not use default white tooltips.
instructions_to_main_agent.buckets_visualization: For the 'Buckets' (Caixinhas), use a Progress Bar component. If the value is negative (overspent), show the progress bar in RED and allow it to 'overflow' visually or indicate 'Over Budget'.
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile_optimization: Ensure the Dashboard stacks vertically on mobile. The Sidebar should vanish and become a Bottom Navigation bar or a Hamburger Menu.
instructions_to_main_agent.data_test_ids: Add data-testid='...' to all buttons, inputs, and major cards.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use left-aligned text for data.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for headers and floating elements.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures/noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
